title: My Beauty Diary Arbutin Whitening Mask, 10 pcs
description: My Beauty Diary's Arbutin Whitening Mask's popular whitening ingredient, arbutin, is mild and comes from the ova ursi plant extract of vaccinium genus. This ingredient has superior effects in purifying, whitening and brightening, building a protective barrier that resists melanin. Moreover, Arbutin breaks down melanin beneath the stratum corneum, allowing skin to be whiter, and more radiant for a flawless and even toned look, whilst establishing an efficient melanin free system. Mon folium and prunus x yedoensis (types of Japanese cherry blossom) extracts are combined with the excellent anti melanin function of flavones to improve uneven skin tone, and rejuvenate the skin to a translucent glow. The fruit enzyme of pineapples and polyphenol protection of apples gently metabolizes dead skin cells, boosts skin fineness and translucency, thus defending the whiteness of skin to provide a flawless and vibrant translucent luminosity.

title: Arbutin Vitamin C Kojic Acid Skin Lightening Cream 1.7 oz.
description: Need to lighten those dark spots without using hydroquinone? Introducing Timeless Skin Lightening Cream, a non oily, luxurious cream. Unlike those other DIY peels and messy Vitamin C powders, our formula lightens gradually over the period of several months, preventing melanin formation. Other powder, peels, and hydroquinone creams simply work by exfoliation, are harsh and irritating, and don't address the underlying problem.This product contains:Arbutin - derived from bearberry leaves, arbutin is the natural alternative to hydroquinone. Inhibits melanin synthesis, thereby lightening dark spots.Vitamin C - antioxidant that evens skin tone and helps build collagen. We use Magnesium Ascorbyl Phosphate, which is less irritating than L-Ascorbic Acid and does not decay as rapidly.Hyaluronic Acid - one of the most powerful hydrating and moisturizing ingredients on the market today. Used to transport the lightening ingredients into the skin and moisturize.And much, much more!
